‘Bomber’

Go back to collection
General

60 x 40cm

Mixed media on board

Year

2016

Description

'There was this day I decided I would stop running from myself for a little while. So I sat down quietly, waiting for me to catch up with me. When I finally arrived next to myself. All sweaty and gasping for breath. All I could do was hand myself this note saying: 'The most dangerous thing you ever did was trying to be safe, instead of being me.' 'There was this day I decided I would stop running from myself for a little while. So I sat down quietly, waiting for me to catch up with me. When I finally arrived next to myself. All sweaty and gasping for breath. All I could do was hand myself this note saying: 'The most dangerous thing you ever did was trying to be safe, instead of being me.'
